column1: In first place we have Oppenheimer that made $1 000 000 000
In second place we have Fast X that made $900 000 000
In third place we have Barbie that made $800 000 000
In fourth place we have The Super Mario Bros Movie that made $700 000 000
In fifth place we have Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 that made $600 000 000
Adidas shoes are popular in Denmark

Nike is the most popular sneaker brand among U.S. consumers with 64 percent of respondents who know the brand actually liking it. Adidas also enjoys a significant preference but lags behind Nike. New Balance and Converse and Skechers follow some way behind.
Adidas shoes are popular in Europe

China's footwear market is dominated by the global sportswear giant Nike which accounted for approximately 9.5 percent of the market in 2022. The second most popular shoe brand was Adidas  which had a market share of around 4.7 percent.
Vaniljekranse are one of the most famous Danish cookies.
Chocolate Digestives are a clear winner in the UK biscuit world. Chocolate Digestives are a classic that has been a feature in many biscuit tins in the UK
It's the chocolate chip cookie that's the most popular in the U.S.
This is an ANZAC (Australian and New Zealand Army Corps) biscuit the most popular cookie Down Under in Australia.
